name: Chazzanut
description: Traditions used by the Jewish cantor, the chazzan when reciting and chanting different parts of the Jewish prayer in Jewish Liturgical Music.

children.name: Ashkenazi Cantorial Music
children.description: Artistic, refined form of Chazzanut that greatly borrows from and implements elements of Western Classical Music and Christian Liturgical Music into the context of liturgical singing and chanting.
